notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Synthesis of compounds: P.P.; inhibition studies: S.D.; writing and revising the manuscript: S.D., P.P., P.W.K.W., Y.M.Y., and Z.J.; discussion of results: S.D., P.P., P.W.K.W., L.L.O., Y.M.Y., D.Z. and Z.J.; in silico studies: S.D., Y.M.Y., and D.Z.; supervision: D.Z. and Z.J. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
